text: Chaiyaphum () is one of the Isan (north-eastern) provinces (changwat) of Thailand. As of 2000, 1 million people live there, and has an area of 12,778.3 kmÂ². The Governor is Thawon Phrommichai. ==Geography== * Chulabhorn Dam == Administrative divisions == The province has 16 districts (amphoe); 124 subdistricts (tambon) and 1393 villages (muban). Category:Provinces of Thailand
title: Chaiyaphum province
